record.title: HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW, ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, MARCH 19, 2007, AND HOUR OF MEETING ON FRIDAY, MARCH 23, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at noon tomorrow; when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Monday, March 19, for morning hour debate; and further, when the House adjourns on Thursday, March 22, it adjourn to meet at 9 a.m. on Friday, March 23.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
